title: Graphic Design
contentParts: We worked on branding guidelines, typography, and layouts to ensure a strong identity. This included creating marketing collaterals and templates usable across multiple platforms.
Our design team collaborated with the client stakeholders to refine the style direction. The overall result was a modern yet timeless branding language.
